column4: Actionparsnip: All I can add is that, after using it, Networkmanager goes berserk and says that "wlan is not being managed"
Actionparsnip: But still does not provide connectivity. I think I would be better off If I don't fiddle with it.
Actionparsnip: Well, There's no Kernel I haven't broken, I think I'll see how much punishment I can get from 2.6.28-15. I'll give it a go and let you know If I find out something.
I shalt be driven by the power of thee, brethren
